item.title: Summary - Hurricane Irma (AT1/AL112017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT FINDS IRMA A LITTLE STRONGER... As of 8:00 AM AST Mon Sep 4 the center of Irma was located near 16.8, -52.6 with movement WSW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 947 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Irma
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT FINDS IRMA A LITTLE STRONGER...
